title: How to Do Hair Ribbons for Girls

steps.headline: Select your style.
steps.description: Choose a color and design that goes well with your hair color and skin tone. (Almost any color goes with blonde hair.)

steps.headline: Decide on the look.
steps.description: Bows do not need to be tied into the hair. Apply the bow to the side of your head, even if it's not tied to anything. Look at the position and size to choose the bow you prefer.

steps.headline: Add the attachment.
steps.description: Tie a ribbon bow and hot glue it onto a bobby pin. Use a clip or barrette for a larger bow. The weight of the bow will slide out of your hair without a proper attachment.

steps.headline: Make your bows.
steps.description: Color the ribbon as needed. Shape and style the bow as you go.
